item.title: CryptoCred's TA Series
item.description: Link to original videos 1: Candlestick Charts What is technical analysis way to make probabilistic forecasts of future price behaviour you don’t have to be a technical trader, you can use it to look for best risk/reward long entries if you’re fundamentally bullish on an asset can be thought of as a risk management tool Candlestick Anatomy red = closing price below opening price green = closing price above opening price OHLC = Open, High, Low, Close Side note: lines drawn on a particular time frame are still displayed at different time frames.
